name: Creation Rotation
description: Wulzy's Creation Rotation as a mod

hide-code.name: Hide Lobby Code
hide-code.description: Hides the lobby code on the lobby screen and the join popup

delete-lvls.name: Delete Levels when done
delete-lvls.description: Delete levels when you're done with them. This does not include the last turn when you receive your level back. Useful if you wanna keep the older versions of levels.

admin-button.name: Admin
admin-button.description: Administrator panel. Will not work without password.

issues.info: Report issues to the GH page
